     5  
     6  package parl
     7  
     8  import (
     9  	"context"
    10  	"strconv"
    11  	"sync"
    12  	"sync/atomic"
    13  	"time"
    14  )
    15  
    16  // serialdo invokes method in sequence
    17  type SerialDo struct {
    18  	inChan     chan *time.Time
    19  	inChanLock sync.Mutex
    20  	isBusy     AtomicBool
    21  	isShutdown AtomicBool
    22  	thunk      func()
    23  	cbFunc     SerialDoFunc
    24  	ErrCh      chan error
    25  	ID         string
    26  	Wg         sync.WaitGroup
    27  	ctx        context.Context
    28  }
    29  
    30  // NewSerialDo SerialDo. errors on sdo.ErrCh
    31  func NewSerialDo(thunk func(), eventReceiver SerialDoFunc, ctx context.Context) (sdo *SerialDo) {
    32  	if thunk == nil {
    33  		panic(Errorf("NewSerialDo with thunk nil"))
    34  	}
    35  	if ctx == nil {
    36  		ctx = context.Background()
    37  	}
    38  	if eventReceiver == nil {
    39  		eventReceiver = func(e SerialDoEvent, s *SerialDo, t *time.Time) {}
    40  	}
    41  	ID := strconv.FormatUint(atomic.AddUint64(&serialDoNo, 1), 10)
    42  	sdo = &SerialDo{
    43  		inChan: make(chan *time.Time, 1), inChanLock: sync.Mutex{},
    44  		thunk: thunk, cbFunc: eventReceiver, ErrCh: make(chan error),
    45  		ID: ID, ctx: ctx,
    46  	}
    47  	sdo.Wg.Add(1)
    48  	go sdo.inReader()
    49  	return
    50  }
    51  
    52  type SerialDoEvent uint8
    53  
    54  type SerialDoFunc func(SerialDoEvent, *SerialDo, *time.Time)
    55  
    56  var serialDoNo uint64
    57  
    58  const (
    59  	SerialDoReady         = 0 + iota
    60  	SerialDoLaunch        // from idle, now time
    61  	SerialDoPending       // queued up invocation, request time
    62  	SerialDoPendingLaunch // launch of pending invocation, request time
    63  	SerialDoIdle          // busy since
    64  )
    65  
    66  // Invoke thunk serially, maximum queue one invocation, drop additional invocation requests prior to idle. non-blocking Thread-safe
    67  func (sdo *SerialDo) Do(now time.Time) (nowPending bool) {
    68  	if sdo.isShutdown.IsTrue() {
    69  		panic(Errorf("SerialDo#%s: Do after shutdown", sdo.ID))
    70  	}
    71  	if len(sdo.inChan) > 0 || !sdo.sendInChan(&now) {
    72  		return
    73  	}
    74  	nowPending = sdo.isBusy.IsTrue()
    75  	if nowPending {
    76  		sdo.cbFunc(SerialDoPending, sdo, &now)
    77  	}
    78  	return
    79  }
    80  
    81  func (sdo *SerialDo) sendInChan(now *time.Time) bool {
    82  	sdo.inChanLock.Lock()
    83  	defer sdo.inChanLock.Unlock()
    84  	if len(sdo.inChan) > 0 || sdo.isShutdown.IsTrue() {
    85  		return false
    86  	}
    87  	sdo.inChan <- now
    88  	return true
    89  }
    90  
    91  func (sdo *SerialDo) Shutdown() {
    92  	if !sdo.isShutdown.Set() {
    93  		return // was already set
    94  	}
    95  	sdo.inChanLock.Lock()
    96  	defer sdo.inChanLock.Unlock()
    97  	close(sdo.inChan) // closes run thread
    98  }
    99  
   100  func (sdo *SerialDo) inReader() {
   101  	defer sdo.Wg.Done()
   102  	defer close(sdo.ErrCh)
   103  	defer Recover("SerialDo#"+sdo.ID+".inReader", nil, func(e error) { sdo.ErrCh <- e })
   104  
   105  	sdo.cbFunc(SerialDoReady, sdo, nil)
   106  	var launchTime *time.Time
   107  	var ok bool
   108  	for {
   109  		select {
   110  		case launchTime, ok = <-sdo.inChan:
   111  		case _, ok = <-sdo.ctx.Done():
   112  			sdo.Shutdown()
   113  		}
   114  		if !ok {
   115  			break
   116  		}
   117  
   118  		// data from inChan: launch
   119  		sdo.cbFunc(SerialDoLaunch, sdo, launchTime)
   120  		for {
   121  			sdo.isBusy.Set()
   122  			ch := make(chan struct{})
   123  			sdo.Wg.Add(1)
   124  			go func() {
   125  				defer sdo.Wg.Done()
   126  				defer close(ch)
   127  				sdo.thunk()
   128  			}()
   129  			select {
   130  			case <-ch:
   131  			case _, ok = <-sdo.ctx.Done():
   132  				sdo.Shutdown()
   133  			}
   134  			if !ok || // application is terminating
   135  				len(sdo.inChan) < 1 { // no pending requests: enter idle state
   136  				sdo.isBusy.Clear()
   137  				break
   138  			}
   139  			pending := <-sdo.inChan
   140  			sdo.cbFunc(SerialDoPendingLaunch, sdo, pending)
   141  		}
   142  		if !ok {
   143  			break
   144  		}
   145  		sdo.cbFunc(SerialDoIdle, sdo, launchTime) // now idle, busy since launchTime
   146  	}
   147  }
   148
